Rules.message: This license does not allow commercial use. HINT: Either drop component or provide as free solution.
This license does not allow commercialisation under a license. HINT Unbundle the component or choose another compensation model
This license does not allow charging support fees. HINT Either drop component or change commercial model
This license does not allow the desired way of commercialisation. HINT Either drop component or change commercial model.
Please note, this license does not eliminate the risk of patent claims by contributors. HINT Either accept/ignore or select alternative component with more suitable regulations
Please note, this license bears the risk of termination, if you will be enforcing your rights against third parties. HINT: Try to substitute the component or unbundle it
Please note, this license will terminate in case you are enforcing your rights against third parties. HINT: Either substitute component or try to unbundle it
This license requires you to make your changes public. This exposes a threat to your aim to protect your trade secrets
Please note, that this license might require you to publish changes you have made even with derivative works. HINT Probably you might want to watch for another component
This license requires you to open source your source code

This license requires you to retain the original license. HINT: resolution is possible by dropping or unbinding (use as infrastructure module) the component and a proper definition of your terms and conditions
Applicable license must be selected and verified that licensee has all required rights for release under selected license
This license does not allow you to modify the components. HINT: Either undo your changes or drop the component
The grant of rights (use, modification, reproduction, etc.) under the license is condition upon compliance with the license obligations
The grant of rights (use, modification, reproduction, etc.) under the license is condition upon compliance with the license obligations
